StringTable.String: A starbase provides the perfect anchor for our orbital defense efforts, via both weapons platforms and a communications hub. With a dedicated defense grid, it will become a formidable barrier for anyone who might try to harm our people.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MiningMissions_Name
StringTable.String: Mining Missions

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MiningMissions_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Hire civilians to gather resources for us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MiningMissions_Dec
StringTable.String: The raw resources we need for ships, starbases, and everything in between are out there. We just need to find them. This mission will redouble our efforts to do just that.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticMineralMissions_Name
StringTable.String: Exotic Mineral Missions

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticMineralMissions_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Hire civilians to gather resources for us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticMineralMissions_Dec
StringTable.String: No matter what manufacturing process we examine, the same minerals show up time and time again as bottlenecks in our production capacity. This mission will help us find more of these crucial and exotic resources.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_RareCrystalMissions_Name
StringTable.String: Rare Crystal Missions

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_RareCrystalMissions_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Hire civilians to gather resources for us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_RareCrystalMissions_Dec
StringTable.String: An ever-increasing proportion of our civilization's wealth, happiness, and prosperity is dependent upon exotic reactions modulated by rare crystals. We will redouble our effort to find these precious things.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalOutreachMissions_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Outreach Missions

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalOutreachMissions_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Hire civilians to spread our message.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalOutreachMissions_Dec
StringTable.String: We shall take the best of our culture, or at least the most marketable parts of it, and show them to our neighbors. And they will love us for it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AsteroidMining_Name
StringTable.String: Asteroid Mining

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AsteroidMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to start building [HS=HS_AsteroidMiner]Asteroid Miners[/HS] that boost our world's manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AsteroidMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Anyone with a spaceship and bad piloting skills can smash a rock. But it takes careful planning and ability to actually extract useful resources in the process.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AnomalyDetection_Name
StringTable.String: Anomaly Detection

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AnomalyDetection_Extended_Name
StringTable.String: Greater Anomaly Detection

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AnomalyDetection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Discover new anomalies in the universe.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AnomalyDetection_Dec
StringTable.String: The discovery of a fresh anomaly is one of the most exciting and pivotal moments a civilization can experience. We should redouble our efforts to find more of these boons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtificialGravity_Name
StringTable.String: Artificial Gravity

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtificialGravity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases [HS=HS_Moves]movement speed[/HS] by 1.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtificialGravity_Dec
StringTable.String: Strictly speaking, we are not able to generate gravity so much as we able to channel it. But if we do channel it, we can make off-world living much safer and more productive.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperdriveOptomization_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperdrive Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperdriveOptomization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the [HS=HS_Moves]Moves[/HS] of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperdriveOptomization_Dec
StringTable.String: It's not enough to travel faster than light, not any longer. We need to go farther, faster. And with these latest proposed adjustments to our hyperdrives, we should be able to do just that.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WarpTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Theory

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WarpTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the [HS=HS_Moves]Moves[/HS] of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WarpTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Having observed the effects of hyperdrive for some time now, our physicists believe a new, more advanced form of propulsion can be developed based on a principal of nested hyperspace bubbles in a system they call 'warping.'

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SlipstreamDrive_Name
StringTable.String: Slipstream Drive

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SlipstreamDrive_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the [HS=HS_Moves]Moves[/HS] of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SlipstreamDrive_Dec
StringTable.String: It has long been understood that one object traveling at warp experiences less drag when traveling in the wake of another. But a new drive may soon make it possible for a vessel to effectively travel in its own wake.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceScanning_Name
StringTable.String: Subspace Scanning

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceScanning_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our sensors, allows us to detect subspace streams.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceScanning_Dec
StringTable.String: A systematic approach is needed when scanning, but the practice is considerably harder in subspace, where basic notions of distance and rotation aren't of much use. A new form of math is required.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceStreaming_Name
StringTable.String: Subspace Streaming

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceStreaming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases ship [HS=HS_Moves]movement speed[/HS] as well as travel across Subspace Streams.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceStreaming_Dec
StringTable.String: Within the fabric of subspace are certain 'channels,' where information seems to flow more readily. By coaxing our sensors to mimic this behavior, we should be able to dramatically increase their efficiency.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ColonialPolicies_Name
StringTable.String: Colonial Policies

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ColonialPolicies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks the Civilization screen and allows us to assign [HS=HS_Policy]policies[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ColonialPolicies_Dec
StringTable.String: Unlocks the Civilization screen and allows us to assign [HS=HS_Policy]policies[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepFieldSensors_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Field Sensors

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepFieldSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the [HS=HS_SensorRange]range of our sensors[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepFieldSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: Deep Field Sensors operate by extending quantum uncertainty principles into the realm of subspace. Basically, by observing hypothetical observers who are in turn observing very real things, we can infer much about objects at greater distances than we could before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Subspace Projection

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds the most advanced subspace control modules to our starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: One limit of our existing sensor technology is how infuriatingly complicated it all is, requiring a great deal of processing power to make sense of any of it. A new breakthrough in visualization will allow users to simply project their sense of perception, allowing us to see far more clearly at the extremes our technology can reach.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumStreamTunneling_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Stream Tunneling

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumStreamTunneling_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reveal the most well-hidden anomalies.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumStreamTunneling_Dec
StringTable.String: The various quantum effects and entanglements our sensor technology relies on do not occur at random, but via distinct patterns we can now finally discern. Our latest sensors will use this breakthrough to effectively tunnel through reality at unimaginable speeds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedLifeSupport_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Life Support

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedLifeSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the [HS=HS_ShipRange]range[/HS] we can travel out into space.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedLifeSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: There's little point to building ships to go places if we can't keep our people alive when they get there. These new life support systems will increase the operating range of our ships substantially.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FleetResupplyDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Fleet Resupply Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FleetResupplyDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the [HS=HS_Logistics]maximum size of our fleets[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FleetResupplyDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: A fleet-based approach to resupply stops treating our space vessels as individuals, but as components of a single entity. This enables economies of scale which will improve our resupply efforts and extend the effective range of all our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarResupplyDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Resupply Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarResupplyDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the [HS=HS_Logistics]maximum size of our fleets[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarResupplyDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: Rather than the fixed boundaries we've been working with, the Interstellar Resupply Doctrine uses a more subtle and refined system of 'hand-offs' between different resupply hubs. This should lead to substantial improvements in fleet range.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_IntermittentSuspension_Name
StringTable.String: Intermittent Suspension

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_IntermittentSuspension_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the [HS=HS_Logistics]maximum size of our fleets[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_IntermittentSuspension_Dec
StringTable.String: A full cryogenic cycle is too slow to be of use for the crew of most ships. But this new system of Intermittent Suspension will allow ships to 'stow' their crews when not in use and spin them up only when needed. This should save on resources, and ultimately increase our fleets' range.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GalacticResupplyDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Resupply Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GalacticResupplyDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the [HS=HS_Logistics]maximum size of our fleets[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GalacticResupplyDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: We no longer need to rely on static hubs for resupplying our vessels. Now we can make use of constantly moving resupply fleets of both piloted and semi-autonomous drones, always available where they're needed most.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalManufacturing_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks Starports for our planets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: Moving our manufacturing operations to micro-gravity environments will eventually allow for the construction of massive structures in space. We're not there yet, but this first step was always going to be the biggest.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalRepair_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Repair

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalRepair_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks Caretaker ships which can repair our fleets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalRepair_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer restricted to the combined action of independent crews, we now have entire facilities in orbit capable of manufacturing ships, with swarms of production crews producing vessels faster than ever before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdvancedComposites_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Composites

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdvancedComposites_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the capabilities of our shipyards.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdvancedComposites_Dec
StringTable.String: This new family of materials, made possible by a breakthrough in materials science, will enable us to build stronger, tougher, and better looking vessels than ever before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalDeploymentMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Deployment Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalDeploymentMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the capabilities of our shipyards.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalDeploymentMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: For some time now, the main barrier to building larger ships was a matter of logistics, of getting all the necessary materials, people, and equipment into the right place at the right time. We're doing this better than ever, and our ships will grow ever larger for it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WeakAI_Name
StringTable.String: Artificial General Intelligence

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WeakAI_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves global Research and unlocks a [HS=HS_Policy]policy[/HS] permitting researchers to do as they please.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WeakAI_Dec
StringTable.String: True artificial intelligence is difficult to achieve, being both loosely defined, and computationally expensive, no matter what definition is used. But this latest advancement, using pseudo-synaptic pattern recognition circuits, is a big step, and should greatly boost our research ability.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AsteroidFactories_Name
StringTable.String: Asteroid Factories

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AsteroidFactories_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the production supplied by our [HS=HS_AsteroidMiner]Asteroid Miners[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AsteroidFactories_Dec
StringTable.String: A surprising proportion of the resource collection process is simply dedicated to finding secure footholds for mining platforms to situate themselves. Fixed, semi-permanent factories on the surfaces of asteroids will enable resource collection on a whole new scale.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicAnalytics_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Relic Analytics

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicAnalytics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves relic benefits.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicAnalytics_Dec
StringTable.String: We've been finding relics left behind by an ancient race known as the Precursors for some time now, discoveries which have led to incredible breakthroughs in a variety of fields. A more focused effort to analyze these relics should tease out even more useful details.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoComputationalTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Computational Theory

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoComputationalTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves global Research.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoComputationalTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Our previous efforts to analyze Precursor artifacts have been limited by just how differently these beings thought. A new form of computer, tuned to emulate the strange patterns the Precursors used, should help increase our research effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicProficiency_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Relic Proficiency

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicProficiency_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves relic benefits.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicProficiency_Dec
StringTable.String: We've studied Precursor relics so long now that the discovery of a new one no longer introduces any great mystery. Test procedures, harnesses, and energy sources have all been refined to the point that the Precursors spill their secrets to us with incredible ease.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StrongAI_Name
StringTable.String: Strong AI

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StrongAI_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to simulate our brightest minds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StrongAI_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest breakthrough in AI has enabled our learning systems to form new pathways at a nearly geometric rate, leading to the first emergence of truly strong AI. The impact this will have on our research programs will be immense.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Relic Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves relic benefits.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We now think about and perceive the universe at nearly the same level as the Precursors once did. Were they to meet us, they might very well consider us their peers.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DriveOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Drive System Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DriveOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boosts the [HS=HS_Moves]speed[/HS] of all ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DriveOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: With a little persuasion, we have been able to convince many of our researchers to leave there cozy research centers, and do some practical studies onboard our ships. The result has been an impressive increase of our average ship speeds. Unfortunately, the researchers will need to return to their offices before too long, unless we continue to fund this endeavor.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmedShuttles_Name
StringTable.String: Armed Shuttles

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmedShuttles_Drengin_Name
StringTable.String: Warships

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmedShuttles_Drengin_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provide a prototype Siege ship to conquer small enemy worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmedShuttles_Drengin_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy and its people must be destroyed if it is to be reborn under our rule. A prototype Siege Ship will bring our might to the weak very quickly.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmedShuttles_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of armed spacecraft.[BR][BR]Provides two free warships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmedShuttles_Dec
StringTable.String: Spaceships are fragile things, and it's no great feat destroying them. The real art is destroying the enemy before they do it to you first. New equipment will be required if we hope to come out on the right side of that calculation more often.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Space Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides access to some basic weapons for space combat.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: In the grand cosmic scheme, our spacecraft, delicate as they are, could be likened to glass houses in a neighborhood fond of stone-throwing. Our approach to survival? Developing stones that are, metaphorically speaking, too swift for retaliation. Thus enters the exciting (if mildly concerning) world of space weaponry research. Our objective? Perfect the art of breaking glass without being home when the shards start flying. It's less about not throwing stones and more about ensuring ours are unforgettable.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WeaponSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Weapon Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WeaponSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for better integration of our newly invented space weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WeaponSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Tracking and targeting enemy ships pose significant challenges, given the astronomical speeds and vast distances involved - even at sublight speeds, vessels can move nearly as fast as light, often at distances spanning millions of kilometers.[BR][BR]To overcome these difficulties, we've developed sophisticated targeting computers. Although these systems are sizeable and require considerable space, they are crucial to bridge the gap between near misses and successful strikes. These advanced computers enhance the accuracy of our attacks, offering a significant advantage in crucial combat scenarios.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Directed Energy Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic energy [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]beam weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] will deliver our will upon enemies at the speed of light. But to make them feasible at ship scales we will require energy supplies, capacitors, collimation systems, and a variety of other related technologies. We will establish a dedicated field of research to begin tackling these challenges.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceLasers_Name
StringTable.String: Photonic Alignment

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceLasers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceLasers_Dec
StringTable.String: Photonic Alignment' heralds a new era in beam weapon technology, far surpassing simple scale. Harnessing the power of light itself, we delve into the fundamental core of energy projection, aligning photons in meticulous arrays of concentrated destruction. This isn't just firepower; it's an exercise in quantum finesse, translating into significantly amplified damage output.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ForgedBeamWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Forged Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ForgedBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ForgedBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: We've discovered a new and more precise way to manufacture the focusing crystals used in beam systems.. These forged systems should prove far more potent than previous models.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponMiniturization_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponMiniturization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the size of our [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS], increasing their power.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponMiniturization_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to breakthroughs in capacitor design, we can now create beam systems in a far smaller form factor than ever before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Using feedback loops, we can now synchronize the waves of energy we supply to a beam system, delivering far more powerful beams. This augmentation system should make all our beam weapons more potent.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DisruptorBeams_Name
StringTable.String: Disruptor Beams

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DisruptorBeams_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks a new, more lethal, [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapon[/HS] component for our ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DisruptorBeams_Dec
StringTable.String: Disruptor systems rely on the sudden delivery of a specific combination of subatomic particles, which - when delivered at a high enough energy - disrupt the electromagnetic forces holding matter together. Nasty stuff. Let's be careful who we point these at.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HighEnergyTransfer_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Transfer

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: Rapidly directing energy from our generating systems to our weapons is one of the primary bottlenecks in our beam weapon systems. A new form of superconductor should enable far greater energy velocities than we've seen before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamIntegrityEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Enhancement

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamIntegrityEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamIntegrityEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: Even the smallest of vibrations can disrupt the focusing of a beam weapon, thus reducing damage output. We can correct this inefficiency with improved dampening systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlasmaBeams_Name
StringTable.String: Plasma Beams

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlasmaBeams_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks Plasma based [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapon[/HS] components for our ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlasmaBeams_Dec
StringTable.String: A new breakthrough has allowed us to accelerate small particles at incredible speeds. The sheer weight of these particles, to say nothing of their enormous temperature, should ensure anyone on the receiving end will have a very bad day.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamCapacitation_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Capacitation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamCapacitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamCapacitation_Dec
StringTable.String: Why have we spent so much time trying to store energy for [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS] in our dimension, when there are entire other planes nearby? By using their capacity for energy storage, tapped at the right time, we can deliver vastly greater attacks upon our foes.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhasorBeams_Name
StringTable.String: Phasor Beams

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhasorBeams_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes Phasor based [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS] available for our ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhasorBeams_Dec
StringTable.String: Much as we can now store energy for our weapons systems in neighboring realities, we could potentially send back parts of our enemies to those realities as well. Not all their parts in one place, though. If possible, we should scatter them among a handful of dimensions.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhasedEnergyMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: Phased Energy Magnification

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhasedEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhasedEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: In order to deliver the energy densities we really want, we need to start building our phasor systems across neighboring dimensions. This way, we should be able to corral a much greater number of particles, including those that don't entirely fit in the one reality.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DoomRay_Name
StringTable.String: Doom Ray

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DoomRay_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes the Doom Ray available. It is exactly what it sounds like.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DoomRay_Dec
StringTable.String: A 'polyphasic decoherence effect generator,' while perhaps a more accurate name, does not have the same emotional weight as 'Doom Ray.' We think our enemies will appreciate the difference.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ThermalBlooming_Name
StringTable.String: Thermal Blooming

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ThermalBlooming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ThermalBlooming_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that our [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS] spend so much of their time in neighboring dimensions, it should be no surprise they're encountering a great deal more of the thermal blooming we observe when they're fired in our own atmosphere. But now, thanks to science, we can control this effect, and channel the energy lost back into the main flow.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Railguns_Name
StringTable.String: Railguns

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Railguns_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Railguns_Dec
StringTable.String: Railguns use arrays of magnets to accelerate projectiles at terrifying velocities, all without any of the hassle or inherent danger of handling explosive propellants.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapon Enhancement

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: Our material scientists have devised a new alloy with far greater potential for use in electromagnets. When installed in our kinetic weapon systems, it should lead to a very noticeable increase in other things exploding downrange from our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponTargeting_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapon Targeting

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponTargeting_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponTargeting_Dec
StringTable.String: [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] travel quickly, but not instantly. Improved targeting systems should help ensure they deliver their destructive energy to the places it will do the most... not good

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticDischargeMiniaturization_Name
StringTable.String: Coil Acceleration

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticDischargeMiniaturization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A variation on railguns and gauss cannons, using magnetic coils for projectile acceleration.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticDischargeMiniaturization_Dec
StringTable.String: Smaller isn't always better, but miniature is always cooler. By making use of interference effects within our better-winded kinetic weapon coils, we're now able to deliver the same amount of magnetic thrust to our far smaller projectiles, and thus make big things go bang much more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Neutronium Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved reload and recharge mechanisms will allow our weapon systems to fire more projectiles in a shorter time span, increasing damage per second (DPS) and general misery among our foes (GMAOF).

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PulseCannons_Name
StringTable.String: Pulse Cannons

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PulseCannons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes Pulse Cannon system available for ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PulseCannons_Dec
StringTable.String: There's little difference between a projectile, or the same mass of particles, walloping at high velocity into the side of an enemy ship. But now, due to some newly discovered quantum effects, we are capable of launching clouds of particles with far greater ease, and consequently, at much higher volume.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperFieldMassDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Neutronium Augmentations

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperFieldMassDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperFieldMassDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: We've finally found a way to use the same principles behind our hyperdrives to accelerate projectiles. Using elongated hyper fields, our projectiles can travel in compressed space and reach incredible velocities.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedKineticWeaponDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Neutronium Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedKineticWeaponDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedKineticWeaponDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: Kinetic weapons require more than just equipment,they require a whole new way of practicing warfare. Everything from the tactics, targeting, and ship maneuvers needs to be adjusted to suit this new means of destruction.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GravitonGuns_Name
StringTable.String: Graviton Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GravitonGuns_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes the Graviton [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapon[/HS] system available for ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GravitonGuns_Dec
StringTable.String: Gravitons don't interact with our conventional kinetic pulse cannons. It took parallel breakthroughs in particle science and cosmology to devise a mechanism for even manipulating them. But that done, we can fire charges at our enemies that will literally tear them apart from the inside.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticMassWeaponry_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitonic Vortex Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticMassWeaponry_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticMassWeaponry_Dec
StringTable.String: [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] don't take easily to explosive projectiles. It's taken a new form of exotic material to make a breakthrough, delivering projectiles with their latent explosive energy 'baked' in.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InertiaEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Electrodynamic Gravitonics

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InertiaEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InertiaEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: A new form of projectile, one which keeps much of its mass in a neighboring dimension, will allow us to fire relatively light rounds at incredible speeds. They'll only bring their full mass to bear on impact.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumPulseDriver_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Pulse Driver

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumPulseDriver_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes the Quantum Driver kinetic weapon system available for our ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumPulseDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest form of kinetic weapon uses specially entangled quantum particles, which upon impact, 'swap' small parts of our target among themselves. In short, they cause utter chaos at a molecular level, which no armor can hope to withstand.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Catapults

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our advances in this field are not a single breakthrough, but a reflection of the amount of effort we've invested in kinetic weapon systems. We have mastered the targeting, tactics, manufacturing, operations, and charging systems needed to make first class kinetic weapons, having wrung efficiencies out of every possible system.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BlackholeGun_Name
StringTable.String: Blackhole Gun

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BlackholeGun_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes the Singularity driver available for our ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BlackholeGun_Dec
StringTable.String: The Blackhole Gun is not a misnomer nor colorful exaggeration. It's a gun which fires blackholes. The blackholes are very small, to be fair - we're not reckless. But they are real, and if we don't like you, they are coming your way.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MassManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Higgs Fields Disruption

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: A breakthrough in particle sciences has enabled us to disrupt the Higghs field via projectiles which are are arguably massless, at least until a quantum chain reaction decays to a certain point. By mixing these particles with conventional matter, we can fire practically wafer-thin projectiles which become far heavier on the way to their target.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AvengerMissileSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Avenger Missile System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AvengerMissileSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AvengerMissileSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Missile systems enable on-the-fly targeting adjustments, rendering most forms of evasive maneuver pointless. This new Avenger system will show how dangerous and flexible missile warfare can be.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileTargeting_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Missile Targeting

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileTargeting_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileTargeting_Dec
StringTable.String: The whole point of missiles is their ability to adjust their course, hitting their targets no matter where. And yet they miss so disappointingly often. We should dedicate more resources to improving their targeting systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissilePayloadOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Matadrox Missile Components

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissilePayloadOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Enhance missile efficacy with Matadrox component integration.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissilePayloadOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Shaped explosives are not new technology to us, but it will take some experimentation to figure out the best way to apply this technique to best destroy spaceships. Poorly designed, they'll waste much of their energy out the rear of their targets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileWarfareDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Cerberus Warhead Ensemble

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileWarfareDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileWarfareDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: There are distinct maneuvers and tactics unique to missile warfare on which we need to train our ship commanders. Range management and flocking behavior alone could fill textbooks.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PayloadMiniaturization_Name
StringTable.String: Leviathan Warheads

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PayloadMiniaturization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the amount of space our missile weapon systems use, increasing their power.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PayloadMiniaturization_Dec
StringTable.String: It's a simple calculation. If we can deliver the same amount of destructive potential in a smaller missile, we can carry more of them. Or other equipment, we suppose.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DevastatorMissileSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Phoenix Missile System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DevastatorMissileSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DevastatorMissileSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Devastator missile system uses a new form of micro-fusion warhead which will enable us to increase both the destructive power of our own ships, and general enemy unhappiness, by vast amounts.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveMissileSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Fury Missile Enhancements

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveMissileSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Elevate missile intelligence with Fury Missile Enhancements.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveMissileSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Adaptive [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile System[/HS] uses targeting information from peer missiles to inform decision making both by the current flock and later salvos. They're always learning.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileProduction_Name
StringTable.String: Icarion Warhead Clusters

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileProduction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Refine tactics with the Icarion Warhead's multi-target capabilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileProduction_Dec
StringTable.String: Our [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]missile system[/HS] work best when fired in volume. Anything we can do on the supply side to make missiles cheaper will ensure that volume is present at the moment of truth.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhotonicWarheadSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Photonic Warhead System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhotonicWarheadSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes available the Photonic [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile System[/HS] for our ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhotonicWarheadSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Photonic Warheads release terrifically high energy photons on impact, far beyond what is released by mere fusion reactions. Our scientists are a little shaky on the details, but that hasn't stopped them turning it into a weapon.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntimatterDetonation_Name
StringTable.String: Antimatter Detonation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntimatterDetonation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Maximize destruction with advanced Antimatter Detonation techniques.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntimatterDetonation_Dec
StringTable.String: Antimatter Detonation technology harnesses the universe's most potent energy source, allowing for unprecedented destructive power. By annihilating matter upon contact, this tech offers a leap in missile warfare, ensuring that our payloads deliver cataclysmic damage with unparalleled efficiency. A game-changer in strategic offense.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdvancedMissileDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Orion's Spear

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdvancedMissileDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes available the semi-sentient Orion’s Spear [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile System[/HS] for our ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdvancedMissileDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: Every missile fired has an envelope in which it can effectively strike its target. The overlap of these envelopes, and the effect they have on enemy maneuvers, is a fantastically complicated problem, but if we master it we may be able to coax our enemy to literally fly into our missiles for us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumTorpedoSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Triton Torpedo System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumTorpedoSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes the new Triton Torpedo [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile System[/HS] available for ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumTorpedoSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The effects a quantum torpedo has upon impact are, by definition, a bit unpredictable. Parts of the enemy ship don't exist any more, or at least exist in a pretty bad place.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissileWarfareMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Klein's Dread

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissileWarfareMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes the new Klein's Dread [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile System[/HS] available for ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissileWarfareMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We have done it! We've wrung every efficiency possible out of our missile systems, tuned these weapons to the very limit of their potential. Our ships can fill entire systems with missiles, raining destruction on anyone they choose.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NightmareMissileSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Nightmare Missile System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NightmareMissileSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes a very lethal new [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile Weapon[/HS] system available for our ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NightmareMissileSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nightmare Missile uses a pair of rapidly orbiting singularities, stable in storage and flight, but abruptly less so on impact. The effect two unbalanced singularities can have on an enemy ships is grave indeed. Also, we usually fire more than one of these missiles at a time.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CascadingDetonations_Name
StringTable.String: Cascading Detonations

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CascadingDetonations_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile Weapons[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CascadingDetonations_Dec
StringTable.String: Cascading warheads don't just explode, they induce small fusion reactions in the enemy armor itself, causing chain reactions for several very exciting seconds after impact.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DefensiveStudies_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Studies

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DefensiveStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to begin building advanced defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DefensiveStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: Spaceships are fragile things, with little hope standing up to even the current level of weapons technology. We should devise new systems which will give our ships a fighting chance of surviving encounters with hostile forces.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EvasiveTactics_Name
StringTable.String: Evasive Tactics

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EvasiveTactics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks Weapon Jammers which can increase the evasion of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EvasiveTactics_Dec
StringTable.String: This revolutionary technology introduces advanced jamming techniques that make it more challenging for enemy systems to lock on.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorDefenseTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Defense Theory

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorDefenseTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advanced [HS=HS_ArmorRating]Armor[/HS] helps mitigate damage from attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorDefenseTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: [HS=HS_ArmorRating]Armor[/HS] is the most conceptually straightforward of defensive systems, but in that simplicity lie many intricacies we will need to master. We can't simply strap weight onto to our ships without compromising their effectiveness. A more subtle solution is needed.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedArmorScience_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Armor Science

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedArmorScience_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology provides us with lighter and stronger [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedArmorScience_Dec
StringTable.String: By dedicating resources to material sciences and fabrication, we should be able to build denser, more resilient [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS] systems, and consequently, denser, more resilient spaceships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorMaterialScience_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Material Science

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorMaterialScience_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology provides us with lighter and stronger [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorMaterialScience_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists in other fields - particularly particle physics and planetology - regularly devise or stumble upon new materials that have potential as armoring substances. We should establish information sharing regimes so that their breakthroughs become ours.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DiamonicArmorComposite_Name
StringTable.String: Diamonic Armor Composite

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DiamonicArmorComposite_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology provides us with lighter and stronger [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DiamonicArmorComposite_Dec
StringTable.String: Diamond, while very hard, is horrifically expensive, and prone to fracturing. By establishing layered composites of diamond and conventional armor plating, we can produce a material that's both extraordinarily resilient, and feasible to manufacture in volume.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SelfHealingArmor_Name
StringTable.String: Self-Healing Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SelfHealingArmor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology provides us with lighter and stronger [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SelfHealingArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: During an impact, the physical material of [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS] doesn't go anywhere; it's just distorted into a shape that makes it far less effective. By using a new breed of fusible alloys within our plating, we can cause these holes and tears to restore themselves using the latent heat energy of the impact itself.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorDensityImprovements_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Density Improvements

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorDensityImprovements_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology provides us with lighter and stronger [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorDensityImprovements_Dec
StringTable.String: To date, the density of a material has always been intrinsic to its structure, a fact of the universe previously unchangeable by us. But thanks to the discovery of a new scientific field which is capable of reducing intra-atomic distances, all of our materials can be made denser, and thus hardier. We're literally improving the universe here.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrganicArmor_Name
StringTable.String: Organic Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrganicArmor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology provides us with lighter and stronger [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrganicArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: Carbon-based molecules can be extraordinarily hard - diamond, for instance. But until now, these crystalline structures only formed under intense pressures. A newly discovered form of chemistry arranges carbon molecules in unusually dense formations, and can produce amazingly durable plating with incredible self-healing properties.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveArmorImprovements_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Armor Improvements

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveArmorImprovements_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology provides us with lighter and stronger [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveArmorImprovements_Dec
StringTable.String: Projectiles aren't invisible - our sensors can easily see what's about to strike us. By channeling hardening fields into the areas where impacts are anticipated, we can make our armor more effectively resilient for almost no cost at all.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticArmorMaterials_Name
StringTable.String: Exotic Armor Materials

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticArmorMaterials_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology provides us with lighter and stronger [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticArmorMaterials_Dec
StringTable.String: Most materials we work with are of this universe, which is fine... just a bit boring. But there are conceivable universes where various physical constants are more conducive to armoring. More tightly packed molecules, that sort of thing. If we 'borrow' these materials for our needs, surely no-one in those other universes will mind.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NullPointArmor_Name
StringTable.String: Null Point Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NullPointArmor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology provides us with lighter and stronger [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NullPointArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: By covering our [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS] in a layer of tightly contained artificial singularities, we can ensure any incoming projectiles are annihilated before they touch us. The handling of such materials is a little tricky, and we'll have to take care not to bump into anything, but this should all be doable.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TemperedArmor_Name
StringTable.String: Tempered Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TemperedArmor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology provides us with lighter and stronger [HS=HS_ArmorRating]armor[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TemperedArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: It's long been observed by those who repair ships that armor panels which have already taken impact are significantly harder than their undamaged neighbors. If we can artificially induce this same effect, we should be able to create far sturdier vessels.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyDeflectionTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Deflection Theory

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyDeflectionTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Basic [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS] will allow our ships to absorb incoming damage.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyDeflectionTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Directed energy beams are a potent new weapon our enemies often wield. Counteracting them will involve a new field of science using equal or greater amounts of energy arranged in defensive fields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyDissipationStrategies_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Dissipation Strategies

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyDissipationStrategies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By deflecting the incoming energy, our [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS] have less to resist.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyDissipationStrategies_Dec
StringTable.String: The energy our [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS] absorb doesn't disappear - that's impossible, at least in this universe. It has to be vented somehow, and we will need to research new technologies to do it without getting harmed in the process.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyShields_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Shields

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyShields_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology provides us with stronger [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyShields_Dec
StringTable.String: While earlier models deflected incoming energy with precisely timed counterblasts, our latest deflector systems are capable of projecting entire shields around our vessels, forming the classic ship-in-a-bubble effect we long envisioned.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldEnhancements_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Enhancements

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldEnhancements_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology provides us with stronger [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldEnhancements_Dec
StringTable.String: By increasing the number of shield emitters we install on our ships, we can ensure no single sector is overwhelmed by incoming energy, allowing networks of shield emitters to support one another.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldRegeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Regeneration

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldRegeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology provides us with stronger [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS].[BR][BR]Unlocks [HS=HS_InvasionTactics]Emp Attacks[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldRegeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: The primary reason shields 'wear out' is due to energy dissipation. By dramatically increasing our dissipation networks - up to and including temporarily storing incoming energy to funnel back into our shields - we can ensure that our shields recharge faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology provides us with stronger [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]Shields[/HS] to date have always been in a single layer, due to limitations in our ability to project through our own shields. But by preparing a temporary new shield ready to deploy in the space behind a shield about to fail, we can effectively defend in depth.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GravimetricShields_Name
StringTable.String: Gravimetric Shields

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GravimetricShields_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology provides us with stronger [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GravimetricShields_Dec
StringTable.String: Light can be bent by gravity; this has been understood for centuries. But it's taken some time for us to be able to artificially generate gravity - albeit in a very localized way - enough to diffuse and deflect incoming energy attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldFrequencyModulation_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Frequency Modulation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldFrequencyModulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology provides us with stronger [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldFrequencyModulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Although it sounds like something someone just made up on the spot, Shield Frequency Modulation uses the very real science of frequencies to modulate our [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS] in a way which makes them more effective. Very complicated stuff.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldFocusAdaption_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Focus Adaption

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldFocusAdaption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology provides us with stronger [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldFocusAdaption_Dec
StringTable.String: A shocking amount of the energy output of our [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS] goes to waste, directed entire arc-minutes off-axis from incoming strikes. By better tuning our shield emitters to more precisely focus on the incoming energy, we can produce stronger, more effective shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InvulnerabilityShields_Name
StringTable.String: Invulnerability Shields

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InvulnerabilityShields_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology provides us with stronger [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InvulnerabilityShields_Dec
StringTable.String: The Invulnerability Shield system channels nearly supernova-levels of energy outwards from our ship, annihilating all but the most ferocious strikes directed our way. Perhaps it's not truly invulnerable, but there are few out there who can test the difference.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldHarmonics_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Harmonics

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldHarmonics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology provides us with stronger [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldHarmonics_Dec
StringTable.String: Our [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS] can take advantage of the interference effects generated when two waves collide. By using very precise sensors to measure incoming energy and rapidly adapting our shield emitters, our shields should prove hardier at almost no additional cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Space Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks [HS=HS_FrigateCategory]Frigate[/HS] class ships and the ability for ships and starbases to auto-volley.[BR]Unlocks [HS=HS_InvasionTactics]Orbital Bombardment[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: Space isn't just big, it's dangerous. This is doubly true if there are aliens trying to destroy our ships. Space Doctrine sets up a department in our government designed to organize both public and private industry to work together, to ensure our civilization's survival.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CruiserDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Battle Cruiser Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CruiserDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to build and design [HS=HS_CruiserCategory]Cruiser[/HS] class starships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CruiserDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: Battle Cruiser Doctrine is a crucial technology that enables the construction of highly advanced and powerful battle cruisers for our fleet. These formidable warships are designed to strike fear into the hearts of our enemies, and secure our civilization's place among the stars.[BR][BR]The Battle Cruiser Doctrine establishes a specialized division within our government and military infrastructure, devoted to the development, deployment and maintenance of these awe-inspiring vessels. By coordinating the efforts of public institutions, private contractors, and military strategists, the doctrine ensures the seamless integration of cutting-edge technology, superior firepower, and tactical expertise into the design of our battle cruisers.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FlexibleBulkheads_Name
StringTable.String: Flexible Bulkheads

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FlexibleBulkheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to fit more components on ship designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StarshipRefits_Name
StringTable.String: Starship Refits

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StarshipRefits_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows ships to be upgraded with the best equipment as well as travel much faster in friendly territory.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StarshipRefits_Dec
StringTable.String: When it comes to upgrading existing ships, there is no simple solution. Engineers must solve the problem of getting components out to ships in space and then devise safe methods to replace old weapons and armor with the latest and greatest technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FlexibleBulkheads_Dec
StringTable.String: If we could move our bulkheads when needed, we could better maximize our space. With Flexible Bulkheads, the internals of our ships would be much easier to adapt for maximum storage.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExtremeMiniaturization_Name
StringTable.String: Extreme Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExtremeMiniaturization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds additional component slots on hulls based on its total mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExtremeMiniaturization_Dec
StringTable.String: This poorly named set of techniques, doctrines, policies and technologies is more of a policy of organizing what goes on a given ship, so that we can fit much more. Contrary to what some have argued, we are not actually shrinking things inside our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Battleships_Name
StringTable.String: Battleship Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Battleships_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to design and build [HS=HS_BattleshipCategory]Battleship[/HS] class starships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Battleships_Dec
StringTable.String: Battleship Doctrine is an essential technology that unlocks the ability to design, construct, and deploy the awe-inspiring battleships that will serve as the ultimate guardians of our civilization. These massive vessels are built to withstand the most intense conflicts, dominating the battlefield with their overwhelming firepower and unrivaled resilience.[BR][BR]The Battleship Doctrine initiates the formation of a specialized branch within our government and military, focusing exclusively on harnessing the full potential of these warships. This branch will work closely with scientific institutions, engineering firms, and military tacticians to ensure that our battleships are equipped with the most advanced weaponry, impenetrable armor, and cutting-edge support systems available.[BR][BR]As this technology is researched, our civilization will gain access to a new class of space-faring juggernauts that will redefine the concept of naval superiority. Unlike the more agile and versatile battle cruisers, battleships serve as the indestructible bulwark of our fleet, designed to engage and obliterate the toughest adversaries in large-scale confrontations. With the Battleship Doctrine in place, our civilization's presence in the galaxy will be reinforced by these monumental symbols of might, ensuring our sovereignty and safety in an ever-changing and unpredictable universe.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DreadnoughtDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Dreadnought Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DreadnoughtDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to design and build [HS=HS_DreadnoughtCategory]Dreadnought[/HS] class starships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DreadnoughtDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: Dreadnought Doctrine is a groundbreaking technology that allows our civilization to design, build, and deploy the most awe-inspiring and fearsome class of starships: the Dreadnoughts. These gargantuan vessels represent the pinnacle of our military prowess, combining unparalleled firepower, unmatched durability, and the most advanced technology to assert our dominance across the cosmos.[BR][BR]The Dreadnought Doctrine calls for the creation of an elite division within our government and military, dedicated to the mastery of these extraordinary war machines. This division will collaborate with top scientific minds, cutting-edge engineering companies, and visionary military strategists to ensure our Dreadnoughts are outfitted with the most powerful weapons, the sturdiest armor, and the most sophisticated support systems known to our civilization.[BR][BR]With this knowledge in hand, our civilization will have access to these monumental starships, which will redefine the very essence of space warfare. Dreadnoughts are the ultimate expression of our civilization's strength and determination, dwarfing all other ship classes with their staggering size, unyielding resilience, and unparalleled destructive capabilities. They are designed to spearhead our fleet, leading the charge into battle and striking fear into the hearts of our adversaries.[BR][BR]With the Dreadnought Doctrine in place, our civilization will be able to command the most formidable force the galaxy has ever seen, ensuring our supremacy and safeguarding our people's future in a vast and uncertain universe.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryMobilization_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Mobilization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryMobilization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to put our citizens to greater use.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryMobilization_Dec
StringTable.String: It won't take much to motivate our civilians to defend themselves. But it will take organizational ability, tactics, and of course equipment. Rifles and boots by the million, to start.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryInvasion_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Invasion

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Invasion Transports which are vital for invading [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS].[BR]Unlocks [HS=HS_InvasionTactics]Surface Invasions[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: Invading another planet is a complicated business, requiring well-trained troops, dedicated equipment, and no small amount of good fortune. We should focus our efforts toward achieving as much of this as possible.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarMarines_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Marines

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to invade worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarMarines_Dec
StringTable.String: Everything is more difficult on the surface of an unfamiliar world, and that includes avoiding being shot. We should establish a dedicated branch of the military that specializes in the dangerous art of planetary invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DroneSoldiers_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Soldiers

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to invade worlds.[BR][BR]Unlocks [HS=HS_InvasionTactics]Shatter Attacks[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DroneSoldiers_Dec
StringTable.String: Drone soldiers know no fear, coordinate perfectly across massive theaters, and can be deployed using tactics that don't require any particular regard for their safety. They lack the personal touch, but that's a small detail we can probably work on.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Killbots_Name
StringTable.String: Killbots

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Killbots_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to invade worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Killbots_Dec
StringTable.String: While our initial attempts at drone soldiers were effective, they lacked a certain charm. Not so with our latest model, the Killbots, which along with being more effective in all the usual ways, are far more charming and personable. We're told our enemies take great pleasure in getting murdered by them.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryDefenses_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Defenses

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to defend our worlds against invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: If we can better anchor our planetary defenses, it will make our worlds far tougher to invade. This provides improved defensive firepower, and allow greater coordination and structure for the rest of our defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Redoubts_Name
StringTable.String: Redoubts

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Redoubts_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to defend our worlds against invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Redoubts_Dec
StringTable.String: While the precise design of the redoubt will be informed by the terrain around it, its function will always be the same: an impossibly tough defensive structure, with carefully arranged layers of defenses. Few invading forces will be capable of capturing one, and none will enjoy trying.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SystemsOfControl_Name
StringTable.String: Systems Of Control

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SystemsOfControl_ShortDec
StringTable.String: New tools will allow us to control more aspects of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SystemsOfControl_Dec
StringTable.String: We can hardly control the galaxy if we can't control our own people. Intertwined sets of laws, monitoring systems, and enforcement practices will ensure our people are all behaving properly.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CentralAuthorityOffices_Name
StringTable.String: Central Authority Offices

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CentralAuthorityOffices_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to manage the transportation of goods to and from our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CentralAuthorityOffices_Dec
StringTable.String: We should be careful not to disperse the power to monitor our people too broadly, lest we lose control over it. Centralized offices can have the equipment and personal necessary to project authority in a place where we can keep an eye on those who exercise it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SecretPolice_Name
StringTable.String: Secret Police

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SecretPolice_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By closely monitoring our populace, we can drastically reduce [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SecretPolice_Dec
StringTable.String: Some problems need to disappear quietly, so we shall create a new institution for doing that. Even its mere existence should have a positive effect, reminding those who might cause problems not to get too far out of line.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MartialLawDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Martial Law Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MartialLawDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks new [HS=HS_Policy]policies[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MartialLawDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: There's always the risk of pushback on some of our more vigorous monitoring and control techniques. While to date our police forces have been able to deal with this, we should be prepared to issue a stronger response if we need to. The temporary removal of rights will make our people realize just how generous we normally are.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlagueCure_Name
StringTable.String: Synthetic Antibodies

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlagueCure_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Enables exotic cures to artificially created plagues that have no known origin.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlagueCure_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to combat that which seeks to kill us from within has increased over the centuries. Now we have the ability to make AI our ally in the fight against unseen diseases, as they now help our immune systems generate novel antibodies to fight infections.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TerrorStars_Name
StringTable.String: Terror Stars

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TerrorStars_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to construct Terror Stars. Time for some cosmic horror.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TerrorStars_Dec
StringTable.String: A superweapon of unparalleled might. Firing it at a star summons the wrath of a supernova, obliterating all that resides within the fragile embrace of a solar system. It leaves naught but the echoes of a once vibrant existence.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CoordinatedTravel_Name
StringTable.String: Coordinated Travel

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CoordinatedTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Every ten turns, our ships' movement increases until they can traverse the galaxy nearly instantly.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CoordinatedTravel_Dec
StringTable.String: With the advancement of Coordinated Travel, our fleets and convoys can move in perfect harmony. This technology uses advanced algorithms and real-time data streams to ensure our fleets can move through friendly space at speeds previously thought impossible.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GloriousLegacy_Name
StringTable.String: Glorious Legacy

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GloriousLegacy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides ultimate understanding of the Precursors. Increases our influence every month until the universe is ours.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GloriousLegacy_Dec
StringTable.String: Our pursuit for immortality is not limited to individuals but extends to our civilization's achievements and wisdom. The Glorious Legacy technology establishes advanced archiving, conservation, and broadcast methods to ensure our culture, discoveries, and stories resonate through the cosmos, forever untouched by time's decay.[BR][BR]This manifests in the non-trivial fact that we have had to reconcile our own beliefs and faiths with the fact that we know, for a fact there there was a Precursor civilization that was created by a set of beings called the Mithrilar. These beings split into the Arnor and Dread Lords who fought each other before most species in this galaxy even evolved. This perfect understanding allows us to intuitively use their works as if they were our own.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CallOfUtopia_Name
StringTable.String: Dream of Utopia

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CallOfUtopia_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases homeworld influence by a massive amount every month.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CallOfUtopia_Dec
StringTable.String: Through the Call of Utopia, our civilization embarks on a journey to actualize a society where harmony, prosperity, and happiness reign supreme. Advanced sociological models, infrastructure blueprints, and community engagement strategies lay the groundwork for turning our utopian dream into a tangible reality. [BR][BR]This culminates through an executive order that, when used, drastically increases the influence of its target core world which will, if not immediately, in short order bring other civilizations into our light.

StringTable.Label: Tech_Consensus_Name
StringTable.String: Consensus Maker

StringTable.Label: Tech_Sanctuary_Name
StringTable.String: Sanctuary

StringTable.Label: MasterSanctuaryTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our diplomatic skills will increase every month.

StringTable.Label: MasterSanctuaryTech_Dec
StringTable.String: To know us will be to love us. The Sanctuary technology focuses on building zones of unparalleled safety, both in terms of defense and societal well-being. Through advanced shielding, rapid-response systems, and a culture of care, these sanctuaries ensure that in times of crisis, our people have an unwavering beacon to turn to.[BR][BR]Every month our diplomatic ability will increase until every civilization cannot help but love us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_IndividualDivinity_Name
StringTable.String: Individual Divinity

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ndividualDivinity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Empowering citizens to ascend to godhood. Citizens will see their stats increased every month.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_IndividualDivinity_Dec
StringTable.String: Unlocking the latent potential within every individual, the Individual Divinity technology sets our citizens on a path of continuous evolution and self-improvement. Through spiritual, mental, and physical enhancement protocols, our people grow stronger, wiser, and more attuned to the cosmos each passing day, edging ever closer to a state of divine existence.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepSpaceLabor_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Space Labor Training

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepSpaceLabor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Trains our thralls to work in space on asteroids and starships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepSpaceLabor_Dec
StringTable.String: Getting our thralls to do work is always hard. Getting them to do it in space is nearly impossible without the right techniques. This technology enables us to more effectively use our thralls to mine asteroids as well as station them on ships which frees up actual people to do what matters.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarPropulsion_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Propulsion

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarPropulsion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes Experimental Drive [HS=HS_Policy]Policies[/HS] available

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarPropulsion_Dec
StringTable.String: We need to better understand what is involved in traveling through bent space in order to make the most of it. This technology will allow us to disseminate to our captains new ways of traveling faster.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetarySubstrates_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Substrates

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetarySubstrates_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Prepare our worlds for synthetic life. Unlocks Housing District.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetarySubstrates_Dec
StringTable.String: By integrating advanced planetary substrates, our robotic kin can seamlessly synchronize with the core of planets, enhancing our resource extraction and optimization capabilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GodOfTheMachine_Name
